Description: When the user clicks on a particular product, the detailed description of a respective product will not show up.
Expected: User should be able to see the detailed product description

Case: Single product added multiple times but price of one item is displayed in cart
Description: When a user adds a single product multiple times price of one item is being shown, the price do not get multiplied to the number of items added.
Expected: Items must be multiplied based on the number of items added to the cart

Case: No option to remove a product from the cart
Description: If a user wants to remove the product from the cart , there is no option to do so
Expected: A remove button on the cart page to remove the respective product
